description: A Deluxe Private room in India's Top Chain of Hostels. Located in Andheri East, a northern suburban area of Mumbai, this Hostel in Mumbai will be a breath of fresh air if you are not accustomed to the chaos of the city. With various stay options suiting all kinds of travellers, be prepared to experience Mumbai like a local both inside and outside the hostel.
